content:
**** New Faculty
Brian Demsky <bdemsky@uci.edu>
[Wed	4-Dec	9:00-9:25]
	Blackout dates:
		October 28
		November 12,14, 21
	Prefer:
		December
Roy Fox <royf@uci.edu>
[Fri	11-Oct	9:00-9:25]
	Pretty much any time starting Oct 4 would work.
	Fridays are slightly better.
Veronica Berrocal <vberroca@uci.edu>
[Wed	13-Nov	9:00-9:25]
	something after the first week of November might be best. 

**** Assistant Profs
Ardalan Amiri Sani <ardalan@uci.edu>
[Wed	9-Oct	9:00-9:25]
	Here are my current blackout dates. I might need to add more later.
	10/4, 10/23, 10/25, 10/30
Qi Alfred Chen <alfchen@uci.edu>
[Wed	9-Oct	9:25-9:50]
	asked for blackout dates, pending reply
Iftekhar Ahmed <iftekha@uci.edu>
[Wed	16-Oct	9:00-9:25]
	October 9th or 16th (Wednesday) work best for me. If these dates are booked, I can do on Friday (October 11th or 18th).
Daniel Epstein <epstein@ics.uci.edu>
[Wed	16-Oct	9:25-9:50
	I'm traveling the week of November 11th and the day before Thanksgiving (27th), but should be otherwise able to come.
Joshua Nathaniel Garcia <joshug4@uci.edu>
[Fri	22-Nov	9:00-9:25]
	I prefer any Friday on the week of Nov. 18 or later. However, if that's not an option, I can do any Friday on Nov. 8 or earlier.
	My blackout dates are next week and the week of Nov. 13 and 15.
Anton Burtsev <anton.burtsev@gmail.com>
	the only blackout date is October 11.

**** Associate Profs
Wayne B Hayes <whayes@uci.edu>
[Fri	11-Oct	9:25-9:50]
	asked for blackout dates, pending reply
Kai Zheng <zhengkai@uci.edu>
[Wed	13-Nov	9:25-9:50]
	Mustafa cc’d will present on behalf of the Health and Information Lab.
	Mustafa Ibraheem Hussain <mihussai@uci.edu>

**** Full Profs/Senior Researchers
Ramesh Jain <jain49@gmail.com>
[Wed	30-Oct	9:00-9:25]
	In general I may not be available:
	Oct 8- Oct 25
	Nov 4- Nov 9
	Dec 1- 9
Chen Li <chenli@gmail.com>
[Wed	23-Oct	9:00-9:25]
	I have a weekly meeting on Fridays at 10 am in DBH.  So it will be good to avoid the second slot on Fridays.
Michael Franz <professor@michaelfranz.com>


****************
EOF
****************
